EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-3rd P Webinar-Engerati-T0021B.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you ready to combat the evolving cyber threats? Watch the webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Thursday 21th June 2018 15:00 London • 16:00 Paris • 22:00 Singapore • 10:00 New York From APT to DDoS to malware, are you ready to combat the evolving cyber threats?
As cyber threats increasingly bypass traditional security tools, how can you deter attacks and attain security compliance? Watch this webinar <[[https://www.engerati.com/transmission-and-distribution/webinars/cybersecurity/apt-ddos-malware-are-you-ready-combat-evolving]]> to explore an extended defence-in-depth network security framework.
This session will review:
- How to attain security compliance and protect your infrastructure - Deter cyber threats by deploying an in-depth network security framework from a technology, governance and policy standpoint - Evolving the security paradigm to counter-act changing security threats
For more information on Nokia solutions, visit our webpage <[[https://networks.nokia.com/power-utilities/smart-grid]]>.
This webinar is hosted by Engerati <[[https://www.engerati.com/]]>. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
